name: Extreme School Bus Driving 3D
description:
Extreme School Bus Driving 3D! Do you want to become a School Bus Driver? Play the latest simulation game: Extreme School Bus Driving 3D having realistic environment will make you feel like driving a real School bus! School bus driving is an addictive simulation game on IOS app store that brings for you realistic drive of crazy school bus on big city roads. School bus will allow you to sit tight at the driver’s seat and go around the attractive city locations and have fun. In this huge school bus simulation you can feel best thrilling and amazing high school bus driving experience in most realistic beautiful 3D environment. Drive the best and Luxurious school bus on beautiful city locations. Big City school bus gets more exciting when you turn on zigzag and thrilling curves of grand city roads. Hold tight and keep patience and avoid obstacles and traffic.The traffic is increasing day by day and in order to drive the 3d bus simulator autobus on the roads, the off road driver in bus simulator pro game needs expertise for Off road bus driving. Heavy bus simulator pro 3d simulator game have multilevel. 3D graphics of the city and mountains are attractive for 3d simulator auto bus transport which are best for tourist eye for offload driving.

Time to get your hands on the most realistic School bus simulator game to help you become the real 3d simulator bas driver. Latest edition of driving in the simulation with Extreme School Bus Driving 3D. Go ahead towards front seat as the school bus driver, and pick up passenger kids and drop them ahead to their destinations in your school bus. Consider yourself as the crazy school bus driver; in charge of the public bus transport, all you have to do is to give your school kids a safe and sound drive round the city, pick and drop them to their destinations in this bus driver simulator game. You have to avoid the collisions with the traffic vehicles in order to pick and drop the school students safe and sound. Use you controls to stay clear of dangers on the road; these controls include signals, dippers, different camera views and much more. And maybe you like this game so much that you might start applying bus driver license for real. School bus driving simulator is a game for everyone that would like to keep those driving skills up to date, you need to practice everything from parking, reversing and use your mental skills to keep calm. Take up the job of bus driving simulator extreme pro School bus and make sure your tourist reach safely to their destinations.
Extreme School Bus Driving 3D game is the first 3d simulator bus driving game that will teach you to drive a real 3d bus across different scenarios! Take School Childs from one place to Public School in city by omnibus 3d simulator.


Extreme School Bus Driving 3D:
 - Multiple Camera Modes to Enhance Gameplay - Indicators (left and right) - Cool weather in the city for School bus 3d simulator. - Realistic visual damage - Steering Wheel, Buttons or Tilting controls - Learn to drive a manual transmission with H-Pattern - Detailed Interiors
- Animated students entering the bus
- Extreme Bus Driving on Dangerous Turns on the road
- Game specifically designed for recreation
- Exciting bus simulator city levels.
- Its a paid game available on app store
